result.title: Smarter, faster, smoother, sleeker
result.review: So this is very much the next generation of gaming console, graphics and speed so fast and smooth. However, additional memory storage is required after half a dozen games are installed. The exterior design and shape are both innovative and crazy big that it dwarfs the old model. A bigger shelf is needed.
